constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 序列的多样性为其不同的元素个数

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 总多样性为所有子区间的多样性之和

constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 可以对区间内的元素进行重排以最小化总多样性
constraints.formal: min(sum(|distinct(A'[l:r])|) for all permutations A' of A[l:r])
